titleStmt.title: Tvvo letters the one to his Excellency the Lord Fairfax, the other to Lieutenant General Cromwell, from the Commissioners of the kingdom of Scotland now residing at London.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.
Lothian, William Kerr, Earl of, 1605?-1675.
Cheisly, John.
Glendinning, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Letters signed: Lothian, John Chiesly, William Glendoning.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
